text:
Márta Kurtág (), "née" Márta Kinsker, often Marta Kurtag; 1 October 1927 − 17 October 2019) was a Hungarian classical pianist and academic piano teacher. In 1947, she married composer György Kurtág. They often played from his collection "Játékok", which they also recorded.
Kurtág died on 17 October 2019, just a week after her 92nd birthday.
